attributes.action: 15 hours free childcare for year 1 & 2 for working parents.
attributes.additional_details:
Why is it, you are entitled to hours free in year 3 of Childcare ? Is it not the same cost in year 1& 2 with the same income.

Why do working families get penalised for working hard and full time, why do we not get any support for contributing to society?
attributes.background: As a new mother, I am due to return to work as a nurse in March 2017. Childcare, to cover my shifts is £600+ pcm. I am confused as to how we are supposed to be able to afford this, yet I am encouraged to return to work as a much needed healthcare professional. Should we not be helped with childcare
